duties_responsibilities.duty: Building systems to help customers understand and respond to experience data provided by their customers or employees.
Designing systems in an agile environment to withstand hyper growth and owning quality from end to end.
Creating trust in customers and teams through thorough communication and showing scrappiness in getting things done.
Partnering with managers, cross-functional teams, and teammates to work well in teams.
Taking an analytical mindset to approach problems and find solutions.
Learning to build scalable, fast, robust, and simple SaaS solutions and implementing new functionality from provided requirements and specifications.
Developing familiarity with containerization and full-stack development.
Working with other engineers, tech-ops, and product managers to learn Agile methodologies and prioritize tasks to deliver value to customers.
Owning a project that pushes the candidate out of their comfort zone and leads to meaningful growth.
Designing distributed, low latency services for ingesting, processing, and aggregating data.
Building integrations with SaaS leaders and creating analytics that identify trends and sentiment in free-form text data.
Developing integrated ticketing platforms and world-class survey editing and survey taking experiences.

education_certification.credential: Currently studying for a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Computer Engineering
